com.qoppa.pdf.resources

Interface IFontResource


  • public interface IFontResource
    Representation of a font resource in a PDF document.
    Author:
    Qoppa Software

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFontName()
      Return the name of this font.
      boolean isEmbedded()
      Returns a flag indicating if this font is embedded in the document.

    • Method Detail

      • getFontName

        java.lang.String getFontName()
                             throws PDFException
        Return the name of this font.
        Returns:
        The name of this font resource.
        Throws:
        PDFException

      • isEmbedded

        boolean isEmbedded()
                   throws PDFException
        Returns a flag indicating if this font is embedded in the document.
        Returns:
        Flag, true if the font is embedded, false o.w.
        Throws:
        PDFException
